languages.text: "Сестра, прошу!" {n}Абеляр, похоже, теряет терпение.{/n} "Сейчас не время для допросов. Корабль атакован еретиками, нас предал дражайший Мастер шепотов, наследник Эдельтрад ожидает нашей помощи, а Лорд-капитан Теодора — доклада об успешных действиях. Мы здесь, чтоб навести порядок — так давайте этим и займемся".

traits.locale_text: "Сестра, прошу!" {n}Абеляр, похоже, теряет терпение.{/n} "Сейчас не время для допросов. Корабль атакован еретиками, нас предал дрожайший Мастер шепотов, наследник Эдельтрад ожидает нашей помощи, а Лорд-капитан Теодора — доклада об успешных действиях. Разумеется, мы здесь, чтоб навести порядок! Так давайте этим и займемся".

languages.text: "Sister, I beg of you!" {n}Abelard appears to be losing his patience.{/n} "Now is not the time for interrogations. The ship is under attack by heretics, we've been betrayed by our esteemed Master of Whispers, Edelthrad the heir is waiting for our aid, and Lord Captain Theodora is expecting a report on our success. We are here to deal with the situation! So I suggest we all do just that."
languages.original_text: "Сестра, прошу!" {n}Абеляр, похоже, теряет терпение.{/n} "Сейчас не время для допросов. Корабль атакован еретиками, нас предал дражайший Мастер шепотов, наследник Эдельтрад ожидает нашей помощи, а Лорд-капитан Теодора — доклада об успешных действиях. Мы здесь, чтоб навести порядок — так давайте этим и займемся".

The ship is under attack by heretics, we've been betrayed by our esteemed Master of Whispers, Edelthrad the heir is waiting for our aid, and Lord Captain Theodora is expecting a report on our success. Of course we are here to deal with the situation! So I suggest we all do just that."

The ship is under attack by heretics, we've been betrayed by our esteemed Master of Whispers, Edelthrad the heir is waiting for our aid, and Lord Captain Theodora is expecting a report on our success. We are here to deal with the situation! So I suggest we all do just that."

languages.text: “修女，我恳求你！”{n}阿贝拉德似乎已经快要失去耐心了。{/n}“现在可不是审讯的时候。这艘船正在遭受异端分子的袭击，我们被尊敬的低语之主出卖了。继承人艾德萨德正在等待我们的援助，而西奥多拉领主舰长正在等待我们凯旋归来。我们就是来解决这个问题的！因此，我建议我们一起来解决这个问题。”
languages.original_text: "Sister, I beg of you!" {n}Abelard appears to be losing his patience.{/n} "Now is not the time for interrogations. The ship is under attack by heretics, we've been betrayed by our esteemed Master of Whispers, Edelthrad the heir is waiting for our aid, and Lord Captain Theodora is expecting a report on our success. We are here to deal with the situation! So I suggest we all do just that."

traits.locale_text: “修女，我恳求你！”{n}阿贝拉德似乎已经快要失去耐心了。{/n}“现在可不是审讯的时候。这艘船正在遭受异端分子的袭击，我们被尊敬的低语之主出卖了。继承人艾德萨德正在等待我们的援助，而西奥多拉领主舰长正在等待我们凯旋归来。我们当然是来解决这个问题的！因此，我建议我们一起来解决这个问题。”

languages.text: «¡Hermana, se lo ruego!». {n}Abelard parece estar perdiendo la paciencia.{/n} «No es momento de interrogatorios. La nave está bajo el ataque de los herejes, nuestro estimado maestro de susurros nos ha traicionado, el heredero Edelthrad espera nuestra ayuda y la Lord Capitán Theodora necesita un informe de nuestro progreso. ¡Estamos aquí para resolver esta situación! De modo que sugiero que nos pongamos manos a la obra».
languages.original_text: "Sister, I beg of you!" {n}Abelard appears to be losing his patience.{/n} "Now is not the time for interrogations. The ship is under attack by heretics, we've been betrayed by our esteemed Master of Whispers, Edelthrad the heir is waiting for our aid, and Lord Captain Theodora is expecting a report on our success. We are here to deal with the situation! So I suggest we all do just that."

traits.locale_text: «¡Hermana, se lo ruego!». {n}Abelard parece estar perdiendo la paciencia.{/n} «No es momento de interrogatorios. La nave está bajo el ataque de los herejes, nuestro estimado maestro de susurros nos ha traicionado, el heredero Edelthrad espera nuestra ayuda y la Lord Capitán Theodora necesita un informe de nuestro progreso. ¡Claro que estamos aquí para resolver esta situación! De modo que sugiero que nos pongamos manos a la obra».

languages.text: 「シスター、お願いします！」{n}アベラルドは忍耐力を失っているようだ。{/n}「今は尋問している場合ではありません。船は異端者の攻撃にさらされていて、我々は尊敬していた囁きの主に裏切られ、後継者エデルスラドは我々の助けを待っている。ロード・キャプテン、シオドーラ様は我々の成功についての報告を待っている。我々はこの状況に対処するためにここにいるのです！ですから、全員がこの点に専心するようお勧めします」
languages.original_text: "Sister, I beg of you!" {n}Abelard appears to be losing his patience.{/n} "Now is not the time for interrogations. The ship is under attack by heretics, we've been betrayed by our esteemed Master of Whispers, Edelthrad the heir is waiting for our aid, and Lord Captain Theodora is expecting a report on our success. We are here to deal with the situation! So I suggest we all do just that."

traits.locale_text: 「シスター、お願いします！」{n} アベラルドは忍耐力を失っているようだ。{/n}「今は尋問している場合ではない。船は異端者の攻撃にさらされていて、我々は尊敬していた囁きの主に裏切られ、後継者エデルスラドは我々の助けを待っている。ロード・キャプテンテオドラは私たちの成功についての報告を待っている。当然、我々はこの状況に対処するためにここにいるのです！ですから、全員がこの点に専心するようお勧めします」

「シスター、お願いします！」{n}アベラルドは忍耐力を失っているようだ。{/n}「今は尋問している場合ではありません。船は異端者の攻撃にさらされていて、我々は尊敬していた囁きの主に裏切られ、後継者エデルスラドは我々の助けを待っている。ロード・キャプテン、シオドーラ様は我々の成功についての報告を待っている。我々はこの状況に対処するためにここにいるのです！ですから、全員がこの点に専心するようお勧めします」

languages.original_text: "Sister, I beg of you!" {n}Abelard appears to be losing his patience.{/n} "Now is not the time for interrogations. The ship is under attack by heretics, we've been betrayed by our esteemed Master of Whispers, Edelthrad the heir is waiting for our aid, and Lord Captain Theodora is expecting a report on our success. We are here to deal with the situation! So I suggest we all do just that."

languages.text: « Ma sœur, je vous en conjure ! {n}s'exclame Abélard, qui semble perdre patience.{/n} L'heure n'est pas aux interrogatoires. Des hérétiques attaquent le vaisseau, nous avons été trahis par notre estimé maître des murmures, l'héritier Edelthrad a besoin de notre aide et la seigneure-capitaine Théodora attend que nous lui rapportions notre réussite. Nous sommes là pour régler la situation ! Alors, ne perdons pas un instant de plus. »
languages.original_text: "Sister, I beg of you!" {n}Abelard appears to be losing his patience.{/n} "Now is not the time for interrogations. The ship is under attack by heretics, we've been betrayed by our esteemed Master of Whispers, Edelthrad the heir is waiting for our aid, and Lord Captain Theodora is expecting a report on our success. We are here to deal with the situation! So I suggest we all do just that."

traits.locale_text: « Ma sœur, je vous en conjure ! {n}s'exclame Abélard, qui semble perdre patience.{/n} L'heure n'est pas aux interrogatoires. Des hérétiques attaquent le vaisseau, nous avons été trahis par notre estimé maître des murmures, l'héritier Edelthrad a besoin de notre aide et la seigneure-capitaine Théodora attend que nous lui rapportions notre réussite. Bien sûr que nous sommes là pour régler la situation ! Alors ne perdons pas un instant de plus. »

languages.text: "Schwester, ich flehe Euch an!" {n}Abelard scheint die Geduld zu verlieren.{/n} "Jetzt ist nicht der Zeitpunkt für ein Verhör. Das Schiff wird von Ketzern angegriffen, wir wurden von unserem geschätzten Meister des Geflüsters verraten, der Erbe Edelthrad wartet auf unsere Hilfe, und Lord Captain Theodora wartet auf unsere Erfolgsmeldung. Wir sind hier, um uns der Situation zu stellen! Ich schlage daher vor, dass wir alle genau das tun."
languages.original_text: "Sister, I beg of you!" {n}Abelard appears to be losing his patience.{/n} "Now is not the time for interrogations. The ship is under attack by heretics, we've been betrayed by our esteemed Master of Whispers, Edelthrad the heir is waiting for our aid, and Lord Captain Theodora is expecting a report on our success. We are here to deal with the situation! So I suggest we all do just that."

traits.locale_text: "Schwester, ich flehe Euch an!" {n}Abelard scheint die Geduld zu verlieren.{/n} "Jetzt ist nicht der Zeitpunkt für ein Verhör. Das Schiff wird von Ketzern angegriffen, wir wurden von unserem geschätzten Meister des Geflüsters verraten, der Erbe Edelthrad wartet auf unsere Hilfe, und Lord Captain Theodora wartet auf unsere Erfolgsmeldung. Natürlich sind wir hier, um uns der Situation zu stellen! Ich schlage daher vor, dass wir alle genau das tun."

languages.text: "Rahibe, çok rica ediyorum!" {n}Abelard'ın sabrı tükenmek üzere gibi.{/n} "Sorgulama vakti değil. Gemi, kâfir saldırısı altında. Saygın Fısıltı Üstadımızın ihanetine uğradık. Vâris Edelthrad bizden yardım umuyor ve Lord Kaptan Theodora da tüm bu olan bitenin başarıyla üstesinden geldiğimize dair raporumuzu bekliyor. Bu vaziyeti nihayete erdirmek için buradayız! Hepimiz, bu uğurda hareket etmeliyiz."
languages.original_text: "Sister, I beg of you!" {n}Abelard appears to be losing his patience.{/n} "Now is not the time for interrogations. The ship is under attack by heretics, we've been betrayed by our esteemed Master of Whispers, Edelthrad the heir is waiting for our aid, and Lord Captain Theodora is expecting a report on our success. We are here to deal with the situation! So I suggest we all do just that."

traits.locale_text: "Rahibe, çok rica ediyorum!" {n}Abelard'ın sabrı tükenmek üzere gibi.{/n} "Sorgulama vakti değil. Gemi, kâfir saldırısı altında. Saygın Fısıltı Üstadı'mızın ihanetine uğradık. Vâris Edelthrad bizden yardım umuyor ve Lord Kaptan Theodora da tüm bu olan bitenin başarıyla üstesinden geldiğimize dair raporumuzu bekliyor. Bu vaziyeti nihayete erdirmek için buradayız! Hepimiz, bu uğurda hareket etmeliyiz."
